entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build coreclr/libs components needed by test build #89146
  • .NET 8 AOT: Internal.TypeSystem.TypeSystemException+FileNotFoundException: Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.Extensions.Features' #89141
  • Explore ThreadSanitizer testing #89138
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on ARM64 #89137
    Future
  • Add UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer test legs to runtime-sanitized #89136
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Windows #89134
    9.0.0
  • Enable Use-After-Return detection in AddressSanitizer #89133
  • Enable AddressSanitizer testing for Mono #89132
  • nativeaot/GenerateUnmanagedEntryPoints test fails under ASAN #89131
    Future
  • Dotnet 7 can not work with openssl 1.1.1f #89126
  • Loader\classloader\StaticVirtualMethods\RegressionTests\GetInterfaceMapWithStaticVirtualsAndConstraints fails in NativeAOT #89122
  • ARM64 Real World - Roslyn #89119
  • SSL RemoteCertificateNameMismatch when targeting net8.0 #89118
  • Scoped service should not be resolvable from root provider #89109
  • Generic method static virtuals with default implementation behaves fails to compile #89101
  • [mono] Support UnsafeAccessorAttribute method calls with custom modifiers #89098
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Handle HTTP/3 cases better if needed #89097
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Detect NameResolutionError more reliably #89096
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Map QUIC errors to HttpRequestError if possible #89095
    8.0.0
  • Half.TryParse assertion failure on System.Globalization.Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCaseUtf8_Scalar #89094
  • Adjust Networking metrics to follow OpenTelemetry semantic conventions #89093
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Long running test: SslStreamMemoryConformanceTests.ReadWrite_Success_Large #89092
  • Include info about system call errors in exceptions from creating/opening a named mutex #89090
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Finalizer_InvokedWhenNoLongerReferenced #89089
  • HttpClient.SendAsync throws System.ObjectDisposedException on Android #89086
  • [6.0] [mono] [linux] Conole test failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #89084
  • [Mono]: test_0_ldvirtftn_generic_method in generics.cs crash in Full AOT + Interp mode. #89076
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat blocked by firewall #89073
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #89104
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<IntStruct> #89106
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 20 Regressions on 7/12/2023 7:15:00 AM #89103
  • NETCore.App and AspNetCore.App versions mismatch #89070
  • [mono] Make mono aot-compiler a tool pack in the Sdk #89067
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Revisit HttpRequestException.HttpRequestError type #89080
    8.0.0
  • Generics are assumed to be nullable types and lose nullable annotations. #89143
  • Provide "Left Handed" overloads of matrix create functions #80332
  • [mono][hotreload] Adding a new field didn't work #86172
    8.0.0
  • Explore ways to reduce Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler size #75468
    8.0.0
  • COMHost/ComActivator without separate AssemblyLoadContext #66013
    8.0.0
  • Regex should explicitly target IndexOfAnyExcept(char {, char, char}) when handling non-ASCII vectorized sets #84150
    8.0.0
  • Unable to get exception's filename and line number in mono. #85223
  • Add an easier way of opening named keys via OpenSSL #55356
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json built-in support for more numeric types #87994
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger: Add/Subtract performance can be improved when size of arguments are different #83457
    8.0.0
  • Support unboxing a true nullable and opt-in to faster emitted IL invoke stubs #88952
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Tests failing due to TypeInfoResolver not providing JsonTypeInfo metadata for a type #88982
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver.RootDefaultInstance #89113
  • Frequent WebSocket Compression Segfault #86960
    8.0.0
  • System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize times out on Mono #88777
  • [API Proposal]: Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #64427
    8.0.0
  • `Trace.Assert` does not indicate that a nullable refernece type is not null #88939
    8.0.0
  • Tier0 allocates on a simple cast (boxing) #88987
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Revisit exceptions in Quic #82262
    8.0.0
  • QuicListener AcceptConnectionAsync and OperationCanceledException #78096
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded timed out #88868
  • [browser][blazor] Unexpected files in publish folder #88142
    8.0.0
  • Better behavior for `dotnet --version` with global.json #38097
    8.0.0
  • Update global.json default SDK roll-forward behaviour #77614
    8.0.0
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Native AoT - HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #89087
  • [6.0] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.NumberFormatInfoMiscTests.DigitSubstitutionListTest(cultureName: "prs", shape: NativeNational) expected Context #86338
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization CultureInfoConstructor.Ctor_String failures #88740
    7.0.x
  • [QUIC] Surface transport error code in QuicException #72666
    8.0.0
  • HttpProtocolException is not reported properly on initial HTTP/2 settings handshake failure #82168
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support error codes for HttpRequestException #76644
    8.0.0
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #85729
    8.0.0
  • How to get the socket information from HttpClient request? #63159
    8.0.0
  • Make non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #83495
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT application linking with external static library or object files #89044
    Future
  • other than mscv in window, is there any way to compile nativeaot #89069
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] error: mono_coop_cond_broadcast Cannot transition thread from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #88405
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failures around blittable collections with [Out] and chars #89149
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Avoid generating internal static classes with constant names in Options Source gen #89148
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix TestGenericAddStaticField #89145
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-author-action, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono] Register static rgctx trampolines in the JIT info tables. #89142
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use SearchValues for non-ASCII Regex fallback #89140
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Generate an 'out' local variable for unmanaged to managed stubs when the value needs to be marshalled out to unmanaged #89139
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [PERF] Finish fixing PerfBDNApp, continuation of #89057 #89135
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix the default behavior to trim the RCW interop by default #89128
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix ILVerifier holding files open #89127
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Disable the "casts between generated and built-in COM interop" analyzer when the "enable interop between generated COM interop and built-in COM interop" feature is enabled. #89125
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Use script instead of powershell to set DOTNET_ROOT #89123
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose `MarkStep.ScopeStack` #89120
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89117
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs [#89064 + more HasGCByRef logic] #89116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove feature exclude xml tests #89111
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove etw --exclude-feature tests. #89107
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Ensure last-use copy omission candidates are marked with GTF_GLOB_REF #89088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute xml documentation. #89082
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Driver.Context setter #89081
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [WIP] Testing the fix for Linq.Expressions build #89078
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs #89064
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for default implementation of static virtuals with method constraints #89061
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • React to HttpRequestError API changes #89124
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve GC pause counter naming #89052
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Expose the left-handed matrix creation APIs #88930
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hot_reload] Check for added fields earlier in compute_class_bitmap #89121
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve choice of IndexOfXx routine for some TryFindNextStartingPosition implementations #89099
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Align HOST_TVOS/TARGET_TVOS defines with the rest of the repo #89085
    area-Build-mono
  • Reenable a test on iOS/tvOS/Browser that was disabled #89083
    area-System.Reflection
  • JSON: Add support for Int128, UInt128 and Half #88962
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Add more details in PlatformNotSupportedException #89112
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix broken runtime tests build #89115
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable SxS workload manifests #88781
    area-Workloads
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable reflection in source gen tests and fix AOT testing. #89105
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89045
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Use NDK toolchain instead of CMake for library mode #88886
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Build the shim assemblies as part of libs.sfx #89005
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold BOX+ISINST to null if possible #88989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Nullable compilation on the Options source gen #88973
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #89047
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Fix treating dotnet.native.wasm as native asset during publish #89079

  • Update script to replace the BDN version being used in the PerfBDN app #89057
    area-Infrastructure

    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline #89091
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • [workloads] Add linux-arm64 support for wasm and wasi #89068
    area-Build-mono
  • [TestOnly] port test fixes #89063

  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930

  • Implement HttpRequestError #88974

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Revert "Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements" #89071
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2224107 #89058
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable stackoverflowtester test for win-x86 #89062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Feedback on regex parser PR #89060
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure

  • Remove `#if NETCOREAPP` from test #89041
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • [TestOnly] port test fixes #89065
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization
  • fix pooled array leak #88810
    area-System.IO
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocations in Get/SetMsQuicParameter #89050

Updated

  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328

  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    area-Debugger-mono, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Poc: add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970

    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid extra console write for clearing on Unix #89026
    area-System.Console
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
